title: Episode 35: Special Treatment Or Standard Practice?
description:
Did Alex Murdaugh receive special treatment at his bond hearing? Our legal expert, John Snyder, give his analysis. Plus, one of Alex's alleged victims speaks!


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations
